'''Vestur-Skaftafellssýsla''' is a [[Counties of Iceland|county]] in southern [[Iceland]]. The only significant settlements are [[Vík í Mýrdal]] in the west and [[Kirkjubæjarklaustur]] in the east. It includes Kötlutangi, the [[Extreme points of Iceland|southernmost point]] in mainland Iceland. {{Counties of Iceland}} <!-- {{coord|63|30|N|18|30|W|display=title|region:IS_type:adm1st_source:GNS-enwiki}} --> {{DEFAULTSORT:Vestur-Skaftafellssysla}} [[Category:Counties of Iceland]] [[Category:South Iceland]] {{Iceland-geo-stub}}
